attributes.action: We want you to open the mosques on eid day for eid prayer please
attributes.additional_details: We want mosques to open for eid prayer
attributes.background: To open the mosques on eid so we can pray our eid prayer

rejection.details:
We're sorry we didn't reach your petition before Eid-al-Fitr.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/317856
